title: Close to so much and so charming!
posting_body: Live among the clouds in one of Metropolis updated homes.
Metropolis high-rise towers above its surroundings at thirteen floors!
With a completely unobstructed view of downtown Denver and the Front Range, sunsets over the mountains will be a daily treat.
To top it off, they feature stainless steel appliances, hardwood floors and a shared workout space.
